capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm certain of his age. It sounds like a pretty straightforward piece of information, but it's always good to confirm these things, especially when it comes to kids who might not be very good at keeping track of their own ages!
capsules_submitted.reply: nice! so, i think you're saying that dudley and harry are both eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old, huh? I think that's a pretty typical age for kids around here. (sentiment: neutral)
capsules_submitted.reply: mesmerizing harry is eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old, right? That's still pretty young, but I guess it's a great age for learning new things. I'm not really sure about his personality yet, but I've heard he can be a bit mischievous at times.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's lineage and it's pretty clear that he is indeed a wizard. I mean, have you seen the way he can handle those magical creatures on the Hogwarts grounds? It's not something you'd expect from someone who grew up in the wilderness like him. Anyway, I'm quite certain that Hagrid's parents were wizards too, which explains his own magical abilities and of course, his job as the gamekeeper here at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of hobbies does valeria have besides being a wizard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that's correct.
